rooms.description: Spacious Mediterranean style living room with vaulted ceilings and large windows for natural light, following Vastu principles to ensure a welcoming entrance.
Modern dining area that complements the living room and has a direct view to the garden.
Well-appointed master bedroom with en-suite bathroom and closet space, located in the north-east direction following Vastu.
Cozy bedroom designed for children or guests with adequate space and storage.
Additional bedroom for family use ensuring privacy and comfort.
Functional kitchen with Mediterranean design elements, featuring energy-efficient appliances and ample storage.
Guest bathroom with modern fixtures, ensuring easy access from the living area.

openings.description: Main entrance door designed in Mediterranean style with stone detailing.
Secondary entrance door with modern yet classic design.
Garage door for convenient vehicle access, following local building codes.
